nodes.text: Jedi Escape was a children's storybook published by Scholastic in April 2000 as part of the Star Wars Junior book series.
Qui-Gon Jinn is a Jedi Master who can feel when danger is near. When he is sent to Naboo to solve a dispute, his sharp senses warn him of unexpected danger.
Will he and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape in time?
